Package entities.mobs

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.mobs.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, Goon
public class Enemy
extends Entity
The Enemy class represents an enemy with all the properties of the Entity class
Author:
nathangu
